item.title: Albert Einstein's paper on the mass energy equivalence (E = mc²) was published
Albert Einstein's paper on special theory of relativity was published
item.description: The paper was titled the On the electrodynamics of moving bodies. It reconciled Maxwell’s equations for electricity and magnetism with the laws of mechanics by introducing changes to mechanics, resulting from analysis based on empirical evidence that the speed of light is independent of the motion of the observer. Discredited the concept of a “luminiferous ether”.
